mapper.insert: SELECT tradeacco, custno, mainflag, tradeaccost, opendt, bankno, bankacco, bankaccodisplay, bankidtp, bankidno, updatetimestamp, bankproexists, protocol_no, input_acct_no, subbankno, netpoint, capitalmode, closedt, mobileno, partnerno, accounttype, pzbid FROM tradeaccoinfo WHERE tradeacco = #{tradeAcco}
